timeline.message:
Alpha Scan Rule: Cross-Origin Resource Policy Header

 - Help enforce CORP header. Should be same-origin or cross-origin
 - Raise an alert when CORP header is missing, invalid
   or set to same-site

Signed-off-by: Cotonne <cotonne@users.noreply.github.com>

Alpha Scan Rule: Cross-Origin Resource Policy Header

 - Help enforce CORP header. Should be same-origin or cross-origin
 - Raise an alert when CORP header is missing, invalid
   or set to same-site

Signed-off-by: Cotonne <cotonne@users.noreply.github.com>

Remarks from PR

 - Add "Added" to changelog
 - Fix typos
 - Capitalize title
 - Alert has WASC 14

Signed-off-by: Cotonne <cotonne@users.noreply.github.com>

Remarks from PR

 - Doc: typo and acronym
 - Add function getExampleAlerts

Remarks from PR

 - CORP is only checked for successful requests

Signed-off-by: Cotonne <cotonne@users.noreply.github.com>

Alpha Scan Rule: Cross-Origin Embedder Policy Header

 - Raise an alert when the header Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy is missing or not equal to "require-corp"

Signed-off-by: Cotonne <cotonne@users.noreply.github.com>

Alpha Scan Rule: Cross-Origin Opener Policy Header

 - Raise an alert when Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header is missing
 - Documentation

Signed-off-by: Cotonne <cotonne@users.noreply.github.com>

Alpha Scan Rule: Support for Reporting API
